channel.title: [PI] Range using Melee?

item.title: [PI] Range using Melee?
item.dc:creator: @DerpaDerpy DerpaDerpy
item.description:
@DerpaDerpy wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:511270”][quote author=DerpaDerpy link=topic=629516.msg4270577#msg4270577 date=1364499874]

I am trying to add a ranged npc and I added the animation and gfx but it will only attack up-close…

the is what I have for the attack type:

case 6365: npcs[i].projectileId = 256; npcs[i].attackType = 1; npcs[i].endGfx = 256; break;

Well, what is attackType 1?
[/quote]Range I presume

Try changing it to 2 or 3 and see what happens.[/quote]2 is mage and 3 is dragonfire

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Range using Melee?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“DerpaDerpy, post:3, topic:511270”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=629516.msg4270566#msg4270566 date=1364499558]

I am trying to add a ranged npc and I added the animation and gfx but it will only attack up-close…

the is what I have for the attack type:

case 6365: npcs[i].projectileId = 256; npcs[i].attackType = 1; npcs[i].endGfx = 256; break;

Well, what is attackType 1?
[/quote]Range I presume[/quote]
Try changing it to 2 or 3 and see what happens.
